text: Aaron Kosminski (11 September 1865 - 24 March 1919) was a Jewish immigrant from Poland who was suspected of being the infamous serial killer Jack the Ripper In 2014, a book was claimed to prove Kosminski's guilt in the murders, however the case still remains unsolved. Category:1865 births Category:Births in Poland Category:Polish people Category:1919 deaths
title: Aaron Kosminski
